items.title: Solano County Public Health to host a second COVID-19 vaccination site for eligible individuals / February 12 and 13, 2021
items.summary: Solano County Health & Social Services (H&SS) – Public Health division, in collaboration with Kaiser Permanente, NorthBay Healthcare, Partnership HealthPlan of California, Medic Ambulance and Touro University California, will host a COVID-19 vaccination site on Friday, February 12 and Saturday, February 13, 2021 for pre-registered individuals in eligible tiers who live and/or work in Solano County – regardless of where they receive their care – and currently includes health care workers, first responders and Solano County residents 75 years or older. View the event flyers:-- Flyer in English-- Flyer in Spanish

items.title: Solano County hires new Director of Resource Management
items.summary: Solano County officials have selected Terry Schmidtbauer as the new Director of Resource Management. Starting this month, he will assume leadership over the County's agency responsible for environmental health, public works engineering and operations, building safety, planning, parks and recreation and Delta Water Activities.
